keywords.label: Incorrect Section Captured
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. You indicated the section could not be found, but it appears in your alternate photo. Please capture the specific section requested in the instructions.

keywords.label: Incorrect Photo Type (Close-Up Instead of Overview)
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. The job required overview photos, but only close-up images were provided. Please capture the broader view of the shelf or display as instructed.

keywords.label: Wrong Display Captured
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. The display requested in the instructions was not captured in your photos. Please photograph the exact display or location specified.

keywords.label: Incorrect Battery Display
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. The correct battery display was not captured. Please verify you're photographing the specific battery display listed in the job instructions.

keywords.label: Missing Alternate Photos
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. The required alternate photos were not included. Please refer to the job instructions and capture each required photo before submitting.

keywords.label: Blurry Photos
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. The photos need to be clear and readable. Hold your phone steady and ensure good lighting before capturing.

keywords.label: Angled Photos
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. Photos need to be taken straight on, not at an angle. Position your camera directly in front of the shelf or display.

keywords.label: Photo Framing Too Wide
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. The photos were taken from too far away. Please stand closer so the product or shelf fills the frame.

keywords.label: Duplicate Photos Submitted
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. Duplicate images were provided instead of unique shots for each required photo. Please ensure each photo is distinct and matches the instructions.

keywords.label: Multiple Pallets in One Photo
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. Each pallet must be photographed individually. We received a single photo with multiple pallets. Please capture one photo per pallet.

keywords.label: Wrong Video Type (Shelf-Facing vs Self-Facing)
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. The video should be shelf-facing (showing the shelf while filming), not self-facing. Please review the video requirements in the instructions.

keywords.label: Job Not Completed as Instructed
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. The job wasn't completed as specified in the instructions. Please follow each step and requirement to receive credit. Reach out if you have questions before submitting.

keywords.label: Job Completed Too Quickly
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. The completion time suggests the job may not have been done as thoroughly as required. Please allow enough time to visit the location and complete all steps.

keywords.label: Product Unavailable – Job Not Canceled
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. When a product is unavailable, the job must be canceled through the app rather than submitted. Please use the cancel option and note the reason.

keywords.label: Store Closed – Job Not Canceled
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. The store was closed at the time. Jobs must be canceled through the app when the store is closed. Please use the cancel option and select the appropriate reason.

keywords.label: Job Upload Failed / Empty Submission
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. The job did not upload to our system—we received empty or incomplete responses. We cannot pay for submissions we didn't receive. If the job reappears in your Field Agent app, try submitting again.

keywords.label: Job Completed Outside Store Hours
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. Jobs must be completed during store operating hours. Please check store hours and schedule your visit accordingly.

keywords.label: Wrong Store Visited
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. The job must be completed at the specific retailer and location listed in the instructions. Please verify the store address and retailer name before your visit.

keywords.label: Incorrect GPS Location
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. Our GPS data shows the photos weren't taken at the requested store location. Ensure GPS and location services are enabled before you arrive.

keywords.label: Photos Not Taken In Store
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. Photos must be taken at the physical store location. Please capture all required photos while at the specified store.

keywords.label: Endcap vs Aisle Confusion
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. The requested displays were on an endcap, not in the aisle. Please check whether the display is at the end of an aisle (endcap) or within the aisle, and follow the correct instructions.

keywords.label: Cooler Doors Closed
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. Cooler photos must be taken with the doors open so we can see the products. Please open the cooler doors before capturing the photos.

keywords.label: Item Marked Missing but Visible
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. The item you marked as missing appears visible in your photo. Please review the full photo before marking items as missing.

keywords.label: Product Not Opened
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. This job required an image of the product with its packaging opened. Please follow the instructions to open the product and capture the required view.

keywords.label: Incorrect Item Number
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. The item number in your submission doesn't match the one requested in the instructions. Please double-check the UPC, SKU, or item number before submitting.

keywords.label: Incorrect Product Found
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. The product in your photos doesn't match the one specified in the job instructions. Please verify the brand, size, and identifying details before capturing.

keywords.label: Wrong Product Category
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. The photos don't match the requested product category. Please confirm you're in the correct category as listed in the instructions.

keywords.label: Incomplete Shelf Coverage
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. We need to see the full shelf from top to bottom. Please capture the entire vertical section in frame.

keywords.label: Overlapping Sections
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. The photos overlap and duplicate product coverage. Please ensure each photo covers a unique section without overlapping the previous one.

keywords.label: Item Photographed in Hand
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. Items must be photographed on the shelf in their actual retail location, not held in hand. Please capture the product while it's still on the shelf.

keywords.label: Insufficient Displays Captured
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. Not all required displays were captured. Please ensure you have a photo of every display listed in the instructions before submitting.

keywords.label: Incorrect Display Depth
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. The display depth was labeled incorrectly. Please review the depth options in the instructions and match them to what you see.

keywords.label: 4-Way Display Incomplete
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. All four sides of the 4-way display need to be captured. Please walk around the display and photograph every side.

keywords.label: Displays Not Captured
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. The job required display photos, but only in-aisle photos were provided. Please refer to the job instructions for which displays to capture.

keywords.label: Incorrect Product Count
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. The product(s) were present in the store, but the count you provided was incorrect. Please double-check your counts before submitting.

keywords.label: Wrong Product Purchased
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. The product you purchased was not one of the options requested in the job instructions (e.g., wrong color or variant). Please verify the requested product before purchasing.

keywords.label: Purchase Not Verified
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. The purchase could not be verified. Our GPS data shows the last photo was taken at the store. For purchase jobs, follow the instructions for verification, including capturing required images at home when specified.

keywords.label: Endcap Not Fully Shown
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. Endcap displays must be captured in full—all pallets present. Your photos show only part of the display. Please refer to the example images in the instructions for how to frame endcap photos.

keywords.label: Cooler Doors Not Individual
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. Cooler door images must show each door separately, not as pairs or groups. Please capture one photo per door.

keywords.label: Shelf Count Mismatch
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. The shelf counts you selected must add up to the number of shelves visible in the cooler image. Please review the cooler image and adjust your counts accordingly.

keywords.label: Wrong Product Image Submitted
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. The image of the opened product was not the correct item we requested. Your receipt shows the correct product—you may be able to complete the job by sending the correct product photo.

keywords.label: Receipt Missing Requested Item
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. The receipt image did not include the item we requested. You may be able to complete the job by sending a receipt photo that clearly shows the requested product.

keywords.label: Multi-Pallet Endcap Sides
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. For endcap displays that are 2 or more pallets deep, we need pictures from all sides—left, right, and front. Please follow the instructions for capturing multi-pallet endcaps.

keywords.label: Customer or Self in Photo
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. Photos must not include people—customers, staff, or yourself. Please wait for a clear moment or adjust your angle so no one appears in the frame.

keywords.label: Agent Does Not Meet Qualifications
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. It doesn't meet the qualifications required for this job. Please check the job details before claiming and look for jobs that fit your profile.

keywords.label: Alcohol Opened in Wrong Location
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. Alcohol products must be opened at home, not in the car or at the store. Please complete the required steps at home as instructed.

keywords.label: Job Accepted But Not Completed
keywords.template: Unfortunately, we couldn't approve this submission. We can see displays in your pictures indicating you were at the correct location, but the job was not completed as requested. Please do not accept jobs you cannot complete as instructed.
